aka: 汤姆.佩蒂：居于自在天地——记「野花」的制作过程
awards:
第33届美国制片人工会奖(2022)
　　最佳电视长片制片人奖
this_title: Tom Petty, Somewhere You Feel Free
trans_title: 汤姆·佩蒂，觉得自由的地方
汤姆.佩蒂：居于自在天地——记「野花」的制作过程
introduction: Drawn from a newly discovered archive of 16mm film showing Tom Petty at work on his 1994 record Wildflowers, considered by many including Rolling Stone to be his greatest album ever, Somewhere You Feel Free is an intimate view of a musical icon. (World Premiere) (Centerpiece Film)
chinese_title: 汤姆·佩蒂，觉得自由的地方
foreign_title: Tom Petty, Somewhere You Feel Free
